channel.title: Weird glitch on dodian?
channel.description: Why is the damage counters way off in dodian? For example with veng, a 0 gets shown on you, but you get subtracted 20 health. Also with ring of recoils im trying to make. They always do 0s, but they subtract 1-2 health from the player each time. Same thing with special attacks. You hit a 1 1 but it does like 50 damage to them? Tried looking in player.java maybe it had something to do with protected void appendHitUpdate(stream str)?

item.title: Weird glitch on dodian?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Why is the damage counters way off in dodian? For example with veng, a 0 gets shown on you, but you get subtracted 20 health. Also with ring of recoils im trying to make. They always do 0s, but they subtract 1-2 health from the player each time. Same thing with special attacks. You hit a 1 1 but it does like 50 damage to them?
Tried looking in player.java maybe it had something to do with protected void appendHitUpdate(stream str)?
